Articles.Content:
So I was launching the Garlic II the other day, and as I saw one of my rockets in orbit, I wondered if it would be possible to let one rocket orbit another..

What do you guys think about this?

So I was launching the Garlic II the other day, and as I saw one of my rockets in orbit, I wondered if it would be possible to let one rocket orbit another..

What do you guys think about this?

You can\'t.

The closes you could get would be very close co-orbits that vary only by a little to \'emulate\' them orbiting each other.
